entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Halton Hills
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:14 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 2:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -6.4°C
Wind: E 28 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning late this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets changing to periods of light snow or drizzle after midnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Local blowing snow this evening. Fog patches overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 3. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
